page.title: 19 ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
page.content: We would like to thank all the people who have helped us with this project. Mrs. L. Thorne who came with us on all our visits. Mr. W. Smith who is engineer of the lifeboat,and showed us the lifeboat and gave us lots of information. Mr. A. Beale,auxiliary coastguard,who showed us the station and let us do a pretend rescue. Mr. Haines,owner of Watermouth Castle, who gave us such an interesting tour round the Castle. Mrs. P. Gravell,from Chambercombe Manor,who made our visit so interest- ing. Mrs. J. Rees, our deputy head,whose interest and encouragement and sorting out of computer hiccups has been much appreciated. We thank our Mums and Dads for letting us go on all the visits.
